select count(*) todayJoinCnt from member where to_char(signup_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and exit_flag = 'N'

select count(*) checkinCnt from room_reservation where to_char(checkin, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and room_res_status = 'CHECK IN'
select count(*) expectedCheckoutCnt from room_reservation where to_char(checkout, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and room_res_status = 'CHECK IN'
select count(*) checkoutCnt from room_reservation where to_char(checkout, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and room_res_status = 'CHECK OUT'

WITH dates AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') + LEVEL - 1 AS check_in_out_date FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL < = 7 ) SELECT TO_CHAR(d.check_in_out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd(dy)') AS checkoutDate, CASE WHEN nvl(allCheckoutCnt, 0) = 0 THEN '0.00' ELSE TO_CHAR((checkoutCnt / allCheckoutCnt) * 100, 'FM990.00') END AS checkoutRatio, TO_CHAR(d.check_in_out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd(dy)') AS checkinDate, CASE WHEN nvl(allCheckinCnt, 0) = 0 THEN '0.00' ELSE TO_CHAR((checkinCnt / allCheckinCnt) * 100, 'FM990.00') END AS checkinRatio FROM dates d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TRUNC(checkout) AS checkout_date, COUNT(CASE WHEN room_res_status = 'CHECK OUT' THEN 1 END) AS checkoutCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN room_res_status IN ('CHECK OUT', 'CHECK IN') THEN 1 END) AS allCheckoutCnt FROM room_reservation WHERE checkout BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') + 5 GROUP BY TRUNC(checkout) ) rr ON d.check_in_out_date = rr.checkout_date LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TRUNC(checkin) AS checkin_date, COUNT(CASE WHEN room_res_status = 'CHECK IN' THEN 1 END) AS checkinCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN room_res_status IN ('CHECK IN', 'RESERVED') THEN 1 END) AS allCheckinCnt FROM room_reservation WHERE checkin BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') + 5 GROUP BY TRUNC(checkin) ) rr ON d.check_in_out_date = rr.checkin_date ORDER BY d.check_in_out_date

WITH dates AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') + LEVEL - 1 AS visit_date FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL < = 7 ) SELECT TO_CHAR(d.visit_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd(dy)') AS visitDate, CASE WHEN nvl(allReservedCnt, 0) = 0 THEN '0.00' ELSE TO_CHAR((confirmedCnt / allReservedCnt) * 100, 'FM990.00') END AS reservedRatio, CASE WHEN nvl(allReservedCnt, 0) = 0 THEN '0.00' ELSE TO_CHAR((canceledCnt / allReservedCnt) * 100, 'FM990.00') END AS canceledRatio FROM dates d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TRUNC(visit_datetime) AS reserve_date, COUNT(CASE WHEN dining_res_status = 'CONFIRMED' THEN 1 END) AS confirmedCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN dining_res_status = 'CANCELED' THEN 1 END) AS canceledCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN dining_res_status IN ('CONFIRMED', 'COMPLETED', 'CANCELED') THEN 1 END) AS allReservedCnt FROM dining_reservation WHERE visit_datetime BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') + 5 GROUP BY TRUNC(visit_datetime) ) dr ON d.visit_date = dr.reserve_date ORDER BY d.visit_date
